content:
Don't let the Left keep ,#,DeathofaNation, out of theaters! By going to the see the film opening weekend, you put fuel in our rocket so the movie can reach more people around the country.

Have a great opening weekend.,pic.twitter.com/QNSNPKJMIA
Who wants to keep the racist confederate statues up again?

Everyone who knows how dangerous it is to not learn from the mistakes of the past, regardless of their political beliefs.  
Only those who WANT to repeat those dangerous lessons, have a stake in eliminating those historic reminders.
Maybe you can get the indoctrinated entitled zombies to go by offering free popcorn!
Hahaha! , That's a lot of effort.  I think you're giving their energy levels too much credit.
I live in Georgia. Where will it be playing in Georgia? I have been driving my husband crazy about going to see this movie!
Check on Fandango.

The Dem-Soc and Dems are the Fascists.
They insist everyone be in agreement with them or they will not be given even basic consideration..Will be subject to public humiliation, even violence.
My definition of a fascist is "MY WAY OR THE HIWAY!"
Attitude. Cannot reason
With them.

By going to the see the film opening weekend, you put money in the pocket of a cynical, dishonest shyster

He's the real fascist!
He's the real racist!

that is the truth!,pic.twitter.com/yKZQGs3Dt6

Dinesh is a legend. Get out to the theater if your mommy will allow it.

https://,twitter.com/sethcotlar/sta,tus/1024366886710964224?s=21D, ,…,’Souza’s stance is confounding. He is a POC, immigrant & part of a persecuted group. Yet he aligns himself with groups that are White Nationalist sympathizers. D’Souza the grifter has no true allegiance, he’s selling a product. He’ll lie, do w.e. 4 a sale.

Got my tickets and driving 40 miles away to the nearest theater to support ,#,DeathOfANation, ,@,DineshDSouza, nevermind the fact that there are 5 theaters 5-10 miles away...Worth the scenic route ,#,SupportDinesh
Maybe if the whole movie gig doesn’t work out you could go full Alex Jones and start pumping supplements too
I hope for you a big success with your movie. The truth needs to get out to the public. The MSM has there own story. Not the truth.
I'm definitely going to see this.

But then, they were written by people on the left.. I will just have to see it and judge for myself....hope there are no blue hats (my name for dems) protesting and violent. I am too old + sick for that sort of thing now.
Already got my tickets!
Keep up the good work Dinesh.
Just bought my ticket!
I will be there if it is playing in my area.
How do I request that it come to our town too?

No. Lack of interest will do that for you.
Most Americans would rather eat dog vomit than watch anything your schloped up imagination "creates." Just saying. But the bots... Well who knew they went to the movies.

@,realDonaldTrump, will be there.
White ppl are the real fascists and historically the real racists.  Nothing you can do or say to change that!!
Thank you brave DINESH ...freedom was not FREE...G-D bless American and Trump...who is a special instrument send of G-D....

Lol
